project.name: TIE - Technology Integration & Engineering Departmental Hub

data.name: [TIE-1013] Security & Permissions: MacBook MDM Migration
data.notes:
Summary
Julia Taylor's MacBook Pro (Serial: MFWRJ4WKJR) requires migration from VF's Addigy MDM system to SSC's MDM system for proper security compliance. This migration was identified during a Bitdefender license audit and has been pending completion of SSC MDM policy configuration and Apple approvals.

Value or Impact
Resolving this ensures proper security management and compliance for Julia Taylor's device under SSC's IT governance. This impacts device security posture, software deployment capabilities, and centralized management of company assets. Without proper MDM enrollment, the device may lack critical security policies and remote management capabilities.

Acceptance Criteria
• Device successfully removed from VF Addigy MDM
• Device enrolled in SSC MDM system with appropriate policies applied
• User able to continue working with minimal disruption during migration
• Security compliance verified post-migration
• Bitdefender and other security tools properly configured under new MDM

Technical Details
• Device: MacBook Pro, Serial Number: MFWRJ4WKJR
• Current MDM: VF Addigy system
• Target MDM: SSC MDM (pending policy finalization)
• Migration requires coordination with VF IT team (Cullen Diebold)
• Apple Business Manager approvals needed before proceeding
• Process may be invasive and require extended device access

Affected Systems / Integrations
• VF Addigy MDM platform
• SSC MDM system (to be determined - possibly Apple Business Manager native)
• Bitdefender endpoint protection
• Azure AD / domain joining considerations
• Apple Business Manager

Next Steps or Analyst Notes
Per Alexander Eakins (Jun 2025): Awaiting confirmation from Daniel DeZago that Apple approvals are resolved and SSC has its own MDM solution ready. Need to coordinate with Cullen at VF for migration timing to avoid extended downtime for Julia. Daniel DeZago (Jun 2025) noted that MDM policies need to be written from scratch, which has been delayed due to other priorities. Account access to Apple or Addigy needs to be confirmed before proceeding.

----------------------------------------

Original Description (Retained)

Security & Permissions Request: MacBook MDM Migration

Describe the Issue or Incident:
Julia Taylor's MacBook Pro (Serial: MFWRJ4WKJR) is currently managed under VF's MDM (Addigy) but needs to be migrated to SSC's MDM system. This was discovered during a Bitdefender license audit.

Who or What is Affected:
Julia Taylor and her MacBook Pro productivity/security compliance

Which System, Folder, or Resource is Involved:

    Current: VF Addigy MDM system
    Target: SSC MDM system (pending policy setup)
    Device: MacBook Pro Serial MFWRJ4WKJR

Common Issue Description:
Device migration between MDM systems requiring coordination with VF IT team and completion of SSC MDM policy configuration before proceeding with the migration process.

data.name: [TIE-1015] Resolve Salesforce Call Logging Issue
data.notes:
Name:
william ness

Email address:
wness@safetyservicescompany.com

Which Department are you representing?:
SALE - Sales

What kind of Impact is this having?:
Inconvenience

What type of request is this?:
Software Issue or Bug

Software Name & Version:
salesforce

Steps to Reproduce:
shawn mcmahon's salesforce is not logging his calls on the account page, he is using click to call but the system is not logging his calls and he is having to stop after every call and log his calls on each account which is taking him several minutes on each account drastically slowing his work production down .

Expected vs Actual Behavior:
salesforce should log each call the agent makes and it is not


What should we call this?:
salesforce automation issue

Additional Context:
na

———————————————

https://form.asana.com/?k=fiideHFJeymhykmEGYMuNg&d=169426931772429

data.name: [TIE-997] Adjust EH06 headset settings for audio
data.notes:
Name:
Sarah  Di Stefano

Email address:
sarah.distefano@safetyservicescompany.com

Which Department are you representing?:
SALE - Sales

What kind of Impact is this having?:
Full Stoppage (Revenue Impacting)

What type of request is this?:
Hardware Issue

Device Type & Model:
I am having audio complications, cant make calls. Model EH06 headset you just gave me is problems every day. Today I cant make any calls.

Asset Tag or Serial Number (if known):
Model EH06-P headset / new 

Give a clear description of the issue or damage:
It worked fine yesterday and then today it worked for meetings, but not dialing out of RingSense or Click-to-dial SalesForce.

Is productivity critically impacted?:
Yes

What should we call this?:
Unable to call

Additional Context:
I cant hear anything in the headset when I dial. Some of my calls went to the computer speaker and that worked for a minute and then the client couldn't hear me. When I unplug and replug the dongle it says its connected, but its still not working. I have shut down and restarted too.

———————————————
This task was submitted through IT & Engineering Ticket Form
https://form.asana.com/?k=fiideHFJeymhykmEGYMuNg&d=169426931772429

data.name: [TIE-998] Resolve Audio Issue with RingCentral
data.notes:
Name:
Vincent Barba

Email address:
vincent.barba@safetyservicescompany.com

Which Department are you representing?:
SALE - Sales

What kind of Impact is this having?:
Stoppage (non-revenue)

What type of request is this?:
Software Issue or Bug

Software Name & Version:
ring central

Steps to Reproduce:
no audio connection with ring central. everything else works just not ring central. please assist

Expected vs Actual Behavior:
i should be able to hear vs no audio

What should we call this?:
software bug

Additional Context:
i swapped headsets

data.name: [TIE-1175] - Fix non-functional F key on Dell laptop
data.notes:
Name:
Josh Metzger

Email address:
josh.metzger@safetyservicescompany.com

Which Department are you representing?:
FIN - Finance & Strategy

What kind of Impact is this having?:
Inconvenience

What type of request is this?:
Hardware Issue

Device Type & Model:
Dell Latitude 5540

Asset Tag or Serial Number (if known):
Device name	LD25-0002 Full device name	LD25-0002.ssc.local Processor	13th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-1350P   1.90 GHz Installed RAM	16.0 GB (15.7 GB usable) Device ID	2DBF6F60-F53B-4A2C-AE4C-F89F95F45B46 Product ID	00355-61330-64044-AAOEM System type	64-bit operating system, x64-based processor Pen and touch	No pen or touch input is available for this display

Give a clear description of the issue or damage:
The "F" key on my laptop keyboard will not work. I have restarted my computer, removed the key and cleaned under the key, and was planning to install and then re-install the keyboard but I cannot do it without system administrator rights.  

My work around is using an external keyboard but I have some upcoming travel that I need to us the standard keyboard when working remote. 

Is productivity critically impacted?:
Yes

What should we call this?:
F key not working on laptop keyboard

Additional Context:
I have tried my problem solving skills, nothing has worked.  i would think the next step is trying to do a keyboard uninstall and reinstall.

———————————————
This task was submitted through Technical Integration & Engineering Ticket Form
https://form.asana.com/?k=fiideHFJeymhykmEGYMuNg&d=169426931772429

data.name: [TIE-1018] Resolve Access Issues for Dominique Croom
data.notes:
Name:
William Ness

Email address:
wness@safetyservicescompany.com

Which Department are you representing?:
SALE - Sales

What kind of Impact is this having?:
Broken (Revenue Impacting)

What type of request is this?:
Security & Permissions

Describe the access issue clearly:
Dominique Croom is unable to access salesforce from her computer we had Dan and Alex try to get in we have been using a managers profile for her for 2 days and is very inconvenient! now her ring central also is not working and she can not hear customer when they call in we have restarted her computer and done work arounds with no luck

Who is impacted or blocked by this issue?:
Dominique Croom

Which application or system is affected?:
her computer, her ring central , her salesforce

What should we call this?:
computer issues

Additional Context:
Dominique Croom is unable to access salesforce from her computer we had Dan and Alex try to get in we have been using a managers profile for her for 2 days and is very inconvenient! now her ring central also is not working and she can not hear customer when they call in we have restarted her computer and done work arounds with no luck

custom_fields.description: What value proposition is there in prioritizing this task?

custom_fields.name: Cross Functional Work
custom_fields.description: Select which departments need to coordinate their activity on this task.

custom_fields.name: Percent allocation
custom_fields.description: Asana-created. Percent allocation is a percentage of a person's time that will be spent on the work.

custom_fields.name: Revenue Generation
custom_fields.description: Rate expected revenue uplift from 1 (minimal revenue generation) to 5 (highest revenue generation).

custom_fields.name: Revenue Blocking
custom_fields.description: Rate urgency to unblock revenue from 1 (no immediate revenue blockage) to 5 (critical revenue blockage).

custom_fields.name: Team Efficiency
custom_fields.description: Rate time savings or efficiency improvement from 1 (small improvement) to 5 (major efficiency gain).

custom_fields.name: Strategic Alignment
custom_fields.description: Rate how well this task aligns with company OKRs and sales strategy from 1 (low alignment) to 5 (high alignment).

custom_fields.name: Effort
custom_fields.description: Estimate the level of effort required from 1 (very low effort) to 5 (very high effort).

custom_fields.name: Score (Auto Fills)
custom_fields.description: Auto-calculated weighted score based on Revenue Generation, Revenue Blocking, Team Efficiency, Strategic Alignment, and Effort.

custom_fields.name: Priority (Auto Fills)
custom_fields.description: Automatically set based on Priority Score: High for score ≥ 4; Medium for scores 2–3.9; Low for score < 2.

custom_fields.name: TIE Request Type
custom_fields.description: Pick the main category that best captures the overall nature of this ticket. This selection drives which follow-up questions appear in the form, determines routing rules, and sets the appropriate service-level targets.

custom_fields.name: TIE Request Detail
custom_fields.description: Choose the more granular sub-category that pinpoints the specific issue or request. This helps downstream automations—like priority setting, assignment, and reporting—accurately reflect the ticket’s real-world needs.

custom_fields.name: ESCAPE
custom_fields.description: E – Experience-First: Ensure every decision enhances usability and builds contractor trust. S – Simplify: Ruthlessly remove complexity by confirming only features that reduce friction. C – Centralize: Align on how updates unify compliance data under one secure system. A – Automate & Anticipate: Prioritize tools that handle repetitive tasks and prevent issues before they occur. P – Personalize: Confirm client-specific needs are being met with flexibility and clarity. E – Ecosystem: Evaluate requests for integration and partnership potential.

custom_fields.name: Who is Affected?
custom_fields.description: This is a generally quantifiable field that simply reports which group of people is most affected. This will have an impact on he prioritization.

custom_fields.name: Number Impacted
custom_fields.description: This field is where the user selects the approximate number of people who are impacted by the issue being reported.

custom_fields.name: Personal Priority
custom_fields.description: Personal Priority is a measurement of how important this task is to the person who is submitting the task.

custom_fields.name: Estimated time
custom_fields.description: Asana-created. Estimate time to complete a task.

custom_fields.name: Date Accuracy
custom_fields.description: This field lets the receiving team clarify scheduling confidence even if Lift and Due Date are automated.

custom_fields.name: Task Title
custom_fields.description: The quintessential "What Should We Call This" field. Separated out for the purpose of consistent naming automation.

custom_fields.name: Approved
custom_fields.description: Has this request been approved by your manager?

custom_fields.name: TS Ticket Type
custom_fields.description: For Salesforce, Cloud and Web tickets, this field is used to assign ownership and determine questions in the ticketing form.

custom_fields.name: ESCAPE MULTI
custom_fields.description: E – Experience-First: Ensure every decision enhances usability and builds contractor trust. S – Simplify: Ruthlessly remove complexity by confirming only features that reduce friction. C – Centralize: Align on how updates unify compliance data under one secure system. A – Automate & Anticipate: Prioritize tools that handle repetitive tasks and prevent issues before they occur. P – Personalize: Confirm client-specific needs are being met with flexibility and clarity. E – Ecosystem: Evaluate requests for integration and partnership potential.

custom_fields.name: Virtual Assistant
custom_fields.description: Used to trigger series of Virtual Assistant upon completion.

custom_fields.name: Work Type
custom_fields.description: This is a field that captures the big rocks of work type. Use for development guidance or work prioritization and categorization.

custom_fields.name: Risk MS
custom_fields.description: This is the multi-select version of Risk vectors related to software development

custom_fields.name: Impact Vector
custom_fields.description: This ticket MOST impacts this vector.

data.name: [TIE-995] Created RingCX Number and Access
data.notes:
Name:
Devyn Barroso

Email address:
Devyn.Barroso@safetyservicescompany.com

Which Department are you representing?:
SALE - Sales

What kind of Impact is this having?:
Access Request (Licensing)

What type of request is this?:
Security & Permissions

Describe the access issue clearly:
Phone number/DID for RingCX or Teams

Who is impacted or blocked by this issue?:
Myself

Which application or system is affected?:
No phone number currently

What should we call this?:
RingCX Number and Access

Additional Context:
I have not been issued a RingCX or any other alternative work number. This number is needed so I can call my team, and role play with them when not on site. I am unable to use my personal cell phone, due to the restrictions wtihin the prison setting.
